title: Comparison of intranasal dexmedetomidine alone and dexmedetomidine-chloral hydrate combination sedation for electroencephalography in children: A large retrospective cohort study and propensity score-matched analysis
content:
Publication date: 15 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): Liang Wang, Hezhi Wang, Wen Tang, Linlin Tang, Ying Xu, Ling Xiong
